headline.main: Victims, Roman Catholic Church Spar Over NY Sex Abuse Bill
headline.print_headline: Victims, Roman Catholic Church Spar Over NY Sex Abuse Bill

lead_paragraph: New York legislation to relax one of the nation's most restrictive statutes of limitations on child molestation victims continues to stall under pressure from the Roman Catholic Church and other opponents.
snippet: New York legislation to relax one of the nation's most restrictive statutes of limitations on child molestation victims continues to stall under pressure from the Roman Catholic Church and other opponents....
